title: Trade Pine Disinfectant 5 L- Disinfectant Liquid Kills Viruses and Bacteria- Suitable for Hospitals, Healthcare and Domestic use. (1)
features: • HIGH-QUALITY DISINFECTANT:Pine ready-for-use pine disinfectant 5L disinfects and kills germs on most surfaces around your home, outdoor and indoor environments. High quality and popular antiseptic disinfectant with a pine fresh fragrance. A powerful disinfectant and deodoriser kills odour producing bacteria and fungi and neutralises unpleasant odours.

• MULTI-PURPOSE:Pine floor disinfectant cleaner is a multi-purpose disinfectant with a high level of active ingredient that is perfectly suited for the regular sanitary maintenance of homes, communal spaces and work environments. Disinfect and sanitise a wide range of hard surfaces tables, walls, floors, door handles and regular contact surfaces such as phones, light switches, etc.

• KILLS GERMS AROUND HOME:Designed to help prevent the spread of infections in Hospitals, Nursing Homes, Restaurants, Hotels, Bathrooms, and Foodservice facilities. Suitable for use to clean and disinfect drains, toilets, floors, lavatories, waste pipes, and other areas that need a powerful disinfectant.

• EASY TO USE:Cleaning can be a task that is most avoided by all. But with the pine disinfectants, you can do this job easily. This antiseptic liquid and deodoriser kill odour-producing bacteria and fungi and neutralises unpleasant odours. This product is pleasant to use and does not burn the skin. Modern formulating techniques are utilised to ensure highly effective action and maximum safety in use.

• HOW TO APPLY:Just mop, wipe or spray the surface and leave it to dry. Do not ingest the substance and make sure to wipe any treated areas that may come in contact with food. Read the label before use. For extended germ-killing leave the floor cleaner liquid antibacterial to act overnight. Then scrub with a brush and flush. Killing 99.9% of all harmful bacteria & viruses.
description: Product Description How To Use The pine disinfectant is ready to use liquid cleaner for home and outdoor use, providing maximum protection against viruses and odour-producing bacteria. The cleaner is suitable for cleaning and disinfecting drains, toilets, floors, lavatories, waste pipes, and other areas that need a powerful disinfectant. For use, mop, wipe, or spray the cleaner to any surface and leave it to dry. For more detailed cleaning and germ elimination, spray the surface with the disinfectant and leave overnight. Then, scrub the surface or toilet with a brush, rinse with water, or flush. Trade Pine Disinfectant-A Powerful Cleaner For Domestic & Commercial Use Multipurpose 5l Disinfectant & Sanitizer With Pine Fragrance Pine liquid cleaner is an ideal disinfectant floor cleaner, with a high level of active ingredients for the regular sanitary maintenance of homes, communal spaces, healthcare institutions, and workplaces. The liquid cleaner is specially formulated to kill 99.9% of viruses and most forms of bacteria, black mold, and fungi. It is effective against all enveloped viruses. It disinfects on contact and can be applied directly to almost any hard surface, including walls, floors, and appliances. The ready to use disinfectant cleans walls, floors and switches, phones, keyboards, work surfaces, food prep areas, waste, and rubbish bins, waste disposal chutes, carpets and communal work equipment. It cleans & disinfects the area without any mess and leaves a pleasant pine fragrance. Ideal cleaner & disinfectant for domestic and commercial use. Kills 99.99% of viruses and most forms of bacteria, black mould and fungi. Safe for indoor and outdoor use-does not burn the skin. Premium Quality Disinfectant & Deodoriser Trade pine disinfectant is a premium quality liquid cleaner for home and commercial use. Its powerful formula kills viruses, mold, fungi, and most bacteria for a clean and germ-free environment. It kills 99.99% of germs, including E-Coli and provides long-lasting and mess-free protection against germs and odor-producing bacteria. Multipurpose Floor & Toilet Cleaner The pine disinfectant is a multipurpose floor cleaner that works best for many hard surfaces, including tables, walls, floors, door handles, and regular contact surfaces such as phones, light switches, etc. Its active ingredients make it ideal for domestic and commercial use. The disinfectant kills germs and is perfect for use as a regular toilet cleaner liquid. The strong toilet cleaner cleans and disinfects the washroom area, like floors, tiles, toilets, urinals, drains, cisterns, etc., without leaving any nasty smells. Long Lasting Pine Fragrance Unlike other disinfectants and bleach, pine disinfectant leaves no unpleasant smell. The liquid disinfectant cleans and sanitizes the treated area and leaves a pleasing and fresh pine smell. The ready-to-use cleaner makes cleaning easy, disinfects all types of hard surfaces, and leaves a lasting pine smell. The cleaner is suitable for home use and as an outdoor disinfectant for hospitals, nursing homes, and healthcare institutions. Does Not Burn The Skin The pine liquid disinfectant uses quality ingredients and modern techniques to ensure highly effective action and maximum safety. The active ingredients are carefully selected and formulated to make the cleaner safe for the skin and household use. The disinfectant does not burn the skin and is safe to use in the home and on commercial premises.
